ca.team3161.lib.robot

Class Drivetrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.team3161.lib.robot.Drivetrain

  • public class Drivetrain
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a container for SpeedControllers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Drivetrain(SpeedController[] controllerArray)
      Create a new Drivetrain instance

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      Disable each SpeedController in the collection
      double get()
      The current speed of this Drivetrain
      double[] getAll()
      The speeds of all SpeedControllers within this Drivetrain.

      Call pidWrite on each SpeedController in this collection

      Set the pwm value (-1.0 to 1.0)

      Don't use this!

    • Constructor Detail

      • Drivetrain

        public Drivetrain(SpeedController[] controllerArray)
        Create a new Drivetrain instance
        Parameters:
        controllerArray - an array of SpeedController objects. May be all the same type, or may be mixed.

    • Method Detail

      • setInverted

        public Drivetrain setInverted(boolean inverted)
        Invert all PWM values for this Drivetrain.
        Parameters:
        inverted - whether the PWM values should be inverted or not
        Returns:
        this Drivetrain instance

      • get

        public double get()
        The current speed of this Drivetrain
        Returns:
        the current PWM value of the SpeedController collection (-1.0 to 1.0)

      • getAll

        public double[] getAll()
        The speeds of all SpeedControllers within this Drivetrain. They should all be nearly identical, other than error due to floating point precision.
        Returns:
        an array enumerating all the current PWM values of the SpeedController collection (-1.0 to 1.0)

      • set

        public void set(double pwm)
        Set the pwm value (-1.0 to 1.0)
        Parameters:
        pwm - the PWM value to assign to each SpeedController in the collection

        Don't use this!
        Parameters:
        pwm - the PWM value to assign to each SpeedController in the collection
        syncGroup -

        public void disable()
        Disable each SpeedController in the collection

        public void pidWrite(double output)
        Call pidWrite on each SpeedController in this collection
